job_history.work_description: Process demand analysis, scoping, and gathering of requirements for small and large scale HR projects. Prepare Business Requirement Documents after projects have been approved by PMO. Close the gap communication between businesses and IS. Support and coordinate functional testing processes to make sure stakeholders' objectives are met. Document systems and process flows. Document and analyze current and future processes/systems. Deliver and Support user training. Process security internal control on the quarterly basis to assess US HR/Payroll system users. Send recommendations, and remove/add users per business requests from local and global systems. Investigate, coordinate, and resolve with subject matter experts and/or IS regarding local and Global system issues. Request HR global system back end/portal roles for local HRBPs, COE and Front Office users (Americas). Responsible to coordinate system applications changes and new requirements with IS.

Served as conduit between internal and external customers including the IS team through several HRIS projects and daily activities such as interface and data input troubleshooting. Provided expertise in business analysis for several HRIS projects. Acted as project lead in several HRIS projects, and supported functional testing processes to ensure that system projects meet the needs of all stakeholders. Support user acceptance testing, and user training. Coordinated communications with business and vendors. Documented and analyzed current and future processes/systems. Identified and mapped business needs. Ensured successful project delivery according to business/vendors expectations.

Trained the HR Specialists to navigate and maintain new/updated system applications and processes. Monitored data quality and accuracy based on local/global internal controls. Responsible for working with ADP IS to implement new/changes on the HRIS system according to payroll, local and global business requirements. Ran payroll/non payroll impacting mass loads in SAP for payroll, benefits, or other business purposes. Created and ran reports for subject matter experts. Created and ran monthly/quarterly governmental reports. Designed and documented HR workflow processes. Trained US HR business partners to navigate and utilize the HR/Payroll system.

Gathered all the necessary business and government requirements, including approvals to create/modify Time calculations for new sites or policy changes. Collected all the time files according to payroll schedules for payroll processing. Processed data analysis and reconciliation. Worked closely with business, Employees Services, and IS to resolve issues/troubleshooting.

Supported Human Resources Shared Services and act as the subject matter expert for SAP HCM and other HR applications. Supported Finance, Canada / US Payrolls, and Human Resources Shared Services on bi-weekly and year-end activities. Collaborated with Information Systems, Finance, Canada and US Payroll and Human Resources Business owners on Sarbanes-Oxley requirements and system/process enhancements for key areas of responsibility. Worked closely with business process owners, smes, benefit vendors and Information Systems to ensure data flow were properly planned and managed, and ensure appropriate data quality controls and standards were developed and maintained globally.

skills.name: HRIS (Human Resource Information System)
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with HRIS systems, including implementation, maintenance, and troubleshooting, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Business Analysis
skills.explanation: Strong experience in business analysis for HRIS projects, including requirement gathering, process documentation, and stakeholder management, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Experience in leading and supporting HRIS projects, including project planning, coordination, and delivery, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Strong experience in data analysis, including data quality control, data reconciliation, and report creation, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: SAP (Systems, Applications, and Products in Data Processing)
skills.explanation: Extensive experience with SAP systems, including SAP HCM, SAP Timekeeping, and SAP payroll processing, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Payroll Management
skills.explanation: Experience in payroll processing, including payroll schedules, payroll data analysis, and payroll reconciliation, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Experience in leading teams, including training and mentoring HR specialists, indicating a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Strong experience in communication, including stakeholder management, vendor coordination, and report creation, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Process Improvement
skills.explanation: Experience in process documentation, analysis, and improvement, including workflow design and implementation, suggesting strong proficiency.
